H0.text: What Swedish city is connected to Copenhagen via a bridge. Gothenburg

H1.text: What Swedish city is connected to Copenhagen via a bridge. Stockholm

H2.text: What Swedish city is connected to Copenhagen via a bridge. Uppsala

H3.text: What Swedish city is connected to Copenhagen via a bridge. Malmo

A4.text: Malmö is the site of Sweden's only fixed direct link to continental Europe, the Öresund Bridge, completed in 2000. The bridge connects Sweden to Denmark, and carries both road and rail traffic.

A5.text: Öresund trains connect Malmö to Copenhagen, and Copenhagen Airport via the Öresund Bridge, taking approximately 40 minutes and running as frequently as every 10 minutes during rush hour or hourly at night.
